statements: SELECT student_id, student_name, course, grade, attendance FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE attendance = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, grade, course FROM Students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE course = 'Math' ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 90 AND attendance = 'Present' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade, course FROM Students WHERE grade BETWEEN 70 AND 80 AND attendance = 'Present' ORDER BY course ASC, student_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course FROM Students WHERE grade = 100;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade, course, attendance FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC, grade ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade='A';
SELECT student_id,student_name FROM students WHERE student_grade='B' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit <= 2 OR course_credit >= 4;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, course_id, date FROM attendance;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM grades WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY instructor ASC
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(course_id) > 2
SELECT student_id, course_id, date FROM attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, MAX(grade) AS max_grade, MIN(grade) AS min_grade FROM grades
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT course_name FROM courses LIMIT 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id JOIN courses c ON g.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.student_grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_name, course_name, date FROM attendance INNER JOIN students ON attendance.student_id = students.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON attendance.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY average_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name FROM teachers;
